tasks.label: Init and run DB migrations
tasks.command: $env:FLASK_APP='app.py'; $env:FLASK_ENV='development'; python -m flask db init; python -m flask db migrate -m "initial"; python -m flask db upgrade

tasks.label: Re-run migrations
tasks.command: $env:FLASK_APP='app.py'; $env:FLASK_ENV='development'; python -m flask db migrate -m "auto"; python -m flask db upgrade

tasks.label: Create baseline revision and stamp DB
tasks.command: $env:FLASK_APP='app.py'; $env:FLASK_ENV='development'; python -m flask db revision -m "baseline"; python -m flask db stamp head; python -m flask db upgrade
